description: A compact full‑stack app for BMR/TDEE, calorie targets, macros, and workout guidance. An LLM‑based coach is planned and partially wired (placeholder today), with moderation and admin auditing ready for future integration.
reflections: I prioritized shipping a reliable core (calculations, guidance, admin) and laying the groundwork for a safe LLM coach. Full model integration is deferred due to time, but moderation, rate limits, and audit tooling are already in place—so adding a real LLM later will be possible and safe.
